Author: yellowposy2
Text: Just commenting to share that it is so brave of you to be even considering recovery. I had a therapist in treatment tell me that working on recovery can feel like a loss of control, but itâ€™s really the ED losing control and your healthy self gaining it, which can be new and hard and scary but is so worth it.
